Plot: During their first year of high school, four best girlfriends face off against the domineering student body president who wants to split them up into different social cliques.
Title: Bratz
Writer: Susan Estelle Jansen (screenplay), Adam De La Peña (story), David Eilenberg (story)
Actors: Logan Browning, Janel Parrish, Nathalia Ramos, Skyler Shaye
tomatoConsensus: Full of mixed messages and dubious role-models, Bratz is too shallow even for its intended audience.
